content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: variable_name
      operator: is_not_contained_by
      value: $model_variables
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.266
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger when variable cannot be found in the SDTM model (v.1.7 for SENDIG-3.1)
Rule Type: Variable Metadata Check
Operations:
  - id: $model_variables
    operator: get_column_order_from_library
    name: MODELVARIABLES
Outcome:
  Message: Variable is not allowed in SDTM/SEND
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '266'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: TODO
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 2.1 2.3
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger when variable cannot be found in the SDTM model (v.1.7 for SENDIG-3.1)

Outcome.Message: Variable is not allowed in SDTM/SEND
